snippet: Noncelebrity maternity patients said they experienced a series of indignities as Lenox Hill Hospital went all-out to protect the privacy of Beyoncé and Jay-Z.
abstract: Maternity patients and visitors say they experienced a series of indignities as Lenox Hill Hospital went to great lengths to protect the privacy of singers Beyonce Knowles and Jay-Z, whose daughter was born there on January 7.
lead_paragraph: Noncelebrity maternity patients said they experienced a series of indignities as Lenox Hill Hospital went all-out to protect the privacy of Beyoncé and Jay-Z.

headline.seo: After Beyoncé Gives Birth, Patients Protest Celebrity Security at Lenox Hill Hospital
headline.main: After Beyoncé Gives Birth, Patients Protest Celebrity Security at Lenox Hill Hospital
headline.print_headline: As R&B Royalty Gives Birth, Security Irks Hospital’s Other Patients

keywords.value: North Shore-Long Island Jewish Health System
keywords.name: organizations
